Rated 1 out of 5 by Ana Harris from Please Change to Tube Packaging! This lotion is a big disappointment. The real deal breaker, however, is the bottle dispenser it comes in. The lotion is WAY too thick for this kind of bottle! It is such a struggle to get it out! Judging by other reviews it seems that Shea Moisture has this problem with many of their lotions. I foolishly ignored the reviews thinking it couldn’t be that bad since I didn’t mind a little extra work. Boy was I wrong. IT IS THAT BAD! So now I am adding my voice to the many others, “Please listen to your customers and change your lotion packaging! Tubes would be awesome (as jars are quite unsanitary). But my skin is quite sensitive to essential oils and this lotion stings my skin a bit which is not the case with my “unnatural” lotion. I wish they disclosed which essential oils they use and I hope they will add a fragrance/EO free lotion with argan oil to their collection soon. (Since my review is quite negative I want to add the disclaimer that I love Shea Moisture and especially their hair products. SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Deep Treatment Masque

Description:
Pamper your dry, damaged hair with SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Deep Treatment Masque! Infused with the goodness of raw Shea butter, this intensive treatment masque helps restore health, shine and vitality to over-processed hair.

This deep nourishing treatment masque is enriched with the goodness of Argan Oil – touted for its high concentrations of vitamins A and E that help strengthen and smoothen hair naturally, as well as Sea Kelp extract, which is a humectant that helps your hair retain moisture. These ingredients come together to make an all-natural deep treatment masque that does wonders to smoothen, soften and strengthen chemically treated hair, perfect for transitioning it to healthy natural hair.

The certified organic raw Shea butter in this hair masque deeply penetrates the root and shaft of damaged hair to deliver the moisture and slip your curls need without weighing it down. For best results, use it in combination with SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Moisture Retention Shampoo.
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp - mineral-rich nutrition seals and smoothes hair cuticles.  Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.  Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
ExtraField8: For additional nutrients and moisture, Extra Virgin Olive Oil may be added to masque. Section clean, wet hair. Apply generously. Use a wide tooth comb to distribute evenly from root to ends. Leave in for 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For deep penetrating treatment, cover hair with a plastic cap and apply moderate heat for up to 30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. When using a hair steamer do not cover hair, moist heat will add to masque's hydration.
ExtraField10: Deionized water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Argan Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Emulsifying Wax, Sea Kelp Extract, Panthenol (Vitamin B-5),Essential Oil Blend, Avacado Oil, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower (and) Lonicera Japonica (Japanese honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Hyssopus Officinalis Extract, Salvia Officinalis (sage) Leaf and Equisetum Arvense Extract, Soybean Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Anti-Aging Moisturizer

Description:
Aging skin loses its elasticity which makes it dry, dull and wrinkled. SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Anti-Aging Moisturizer absorbs quickly into the skin to offer deep hydration and also firm facial skin. Designed to help lift and re-define facial contours while improving elasticity, its gentle yet deep moisturizing formula makes it the ideal choice for aging, sensitive skin. 
This luxuriously thick cream with a rich formulation is made with certified organic Shea Butter - a natural moisturizer rich in Vitamin A that helps defend against fine lines and wrinkles, revitalizing dull skin. It is further infused with Frankincense and Myrhh extracts that help fight against inflammation and heal dry skin. The result is an anti-aging formula that boosts collagen production and blood circulation to make your skin look healthy, supple and youthful. 
In short, this deeply hydrating and rejuvenating face moisturizer can utterly transform aging, dry, thinning, wrinkled skin. SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Anti-Aging Moisturizer imparts radiance and improves skin texture as well as tone by boosting new skin cell regeneration and helping your skin retain natural moisture.
ExtraField7: Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids. Cocoa Butter - a natural emollient, softens and smooths skin. Frankincense & Myrrh -  exhibits anti-inflammatory properties help, calm, heal and revitalize dull looking skin.
ExtraField8: After cleansing and toning, apply to face and neck with upward motions. Pat gently when applying to fragile skin around eyes.
ExtraField10:

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Extra-Moisture Transitioning Milk

Description:
Are you transitioning from chemically treated hair to natural hair? If so, SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Extra-Moisture Transitioning Milk is the Holy Grail for dry, damaged hair that needs extra moisturizing! Damaged, coarse, and brittle curls can be the bane of over-processed hair that is often subjected to heat styling. This transitioning milk nurses your hair back to health by strengthening, smoothening and restoring brilliant shine. An excellent hair care cream that is formulated with the goodness of raw organic Shea Butter rich in Vitamin A, it promotes healthy growth for transitioning hair. Enriched with Argan Oil and Sea Kelp, it’s easily absorbed into the scalp and hair shaft, delivering balanced, nourishing hydration to strengthen and hydrate your curls.

SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Extra-Moisture Transitioning Milk is a no- rinse protective styling cream that is best applied to damp hair. It promises to leave your hair so soft and silky smooth, you wouldn’t be able to resist running your fingers through it!
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp Mineral-rich nutrition seals and smooths  hair cuticles.   Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.  Shea Butter -deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
ExtraField8: Apply as a no-rinse, protective styling cream to damp hair. Use as needed.

When I get home all I want is a shower. My normal soap is one of the major store brands, and it''s ok. However, a couple weeks ago I found this stuff at my local big box store and figured I''d give it a shot. It is the best I have ever used. First the scent is not overly perfumed. It does have a definite aroma, but it is a bit musky, clean and light. Very masculine. The soap is not overly thick, and lathers extremely well. The most important thing is it leaves me feeling clean and leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft. After just one use I could tell this stuff really did hydrate my dry over-exposed skin. I''m on my second bottle, and this is the only product I will be using going forward. However, I do have two complaints. The foil seal on the bottle is hard to remove. I think SheaMoisture needs to find a better way of sealing the product. My second complaint is that the bottle is too small. It doesn''t last near long enough. I would like to see a larger size, and would gladly pay extra for it. But as for what''s inside it definitely deserves 5 stars.

Rated 4 out of 5 by Kimberly from Love this lotion! I have suffered for years form keratosis pilaris, which is basically bumps forming in the backs of arms and legs due to keratin buildup in hair follicles. My skin absouletly loves this lotion. I use it along with the body wash for the best results. As with previous reviewers, the lotion is difficult to get out of the bottle. Normally, I use a razor blade to cut the bottoms off of the bottle then use a rubber spatula to remove the lotion and out it in a wide mouth jar. Please do not change the ingredients of this lotion but please consider changing its packaging. Definitely my reasoning for 4 stars instead of 5.
Date published: 2016-04-08
Rated 5 out of 5 by Stan from Best moisturizer I''ve ever used First of all, I should say: I have dry skin and this is by far the best moisturizer I''ve ever used. It is really soothing and lets me get through the day with just one application. I''ve been using it for at least a couple of years now, and don''t see myself switching to anything else. I think Shea Moisture does a great job across the board, but this product in particular is a grand-slam. I''m also very particular about the ingredients used, greatly preferring minimally-processed and organic ingredients to any others. I''m not sure why a few others have trouble getting it out. I''ve never had that issue. I would NOT want the mix of ingredients to change simply to make it more liquid-like. The formulation as it is now is perfect.
Date published: 2015-01-10
Rated 5 out of 5 by C.M. from Great Product! I recently started using this after finishing the Raw Shea Butter body wash and lotion, which was good, but still left my dry skin a little too dry. Rated 4 out of 5 by Nancy from Review: Medium Brown SUMMARY: This is the first time I tried Shea Moisture color system. I watched youtube videos and read a few blogs before buying. I decided to try it, and I'm glad I did! It comes with a lot of product. If you normally buy two boxes of hair dye, you may only need one Shea Moisture color system. I don't color my hair often so the top half of my hair was virgin and the bottom half dyed. WATCH OUT because your hair might come out very dark- close to black. After a few weeks, it washed out and the hair color evened out. Now it's dark brown but the tips are still a slightly darker shade. Next time, I might try light brown...to achieve medium brown. This time I was going for medium brown, but I got dark brown. I'm not dissatisfied though. I still like it and recommend it (just be aware that it might be closer to dark brown). SIDE NOTE: Apparently, the auburns are a hit if you are looking for red undertones. Fingers crossed that Shea Moisture adds light/medium golden brown soon! PROS: pleasant and subtle fragrance, didn't damage my hair at all, truer to color if you have virgin hair, nicely packaged CONS: pricey (but if you think about it, it's worth it), small selection of colors, shampoo and conditioner bottles are small and difficult to use (I would rather Shea Moisture switch to packets...like other box hair dyes)

Rated 4 out of 5 by C from First try on Asian hair I am Asian and have been dying my hair since I was 13. I have tried almost every type of dye out there and have recently in the past 5 years been going to Organic salons or using henna because I was tired of my hair drying out. I came across this product and decided to give it a try. My hair is naturally a dark brown almost black color and I was aware I wouldn''t achieve the box color. The bottom portion of my hair is ombred blonde but has since faded. Overall, I am pleased with the outcome of this coloring. I''d describe it as a golden brown on my hair. I plan on using it again in hopes to achieve a lighter color. I like that this is ammonia free and doesn''t have that disgusting smell that other dyes have. My only criticism is that after opening the product and mixing the color, I realized I was missing the bottle tip as well as the brush, which would have been useful. The containers for the shampoo and conditioner were extremely difficult to get the products out and the elixir made my hair feel oily. My hair; however, still feels soft. This product is a bit more pricey than other dyes but I like that uses less harsh ingredients.

Is your hair feeling dry, brittle and coarse? SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Damage Repair Hair & Scalp Serum gives your dry hair some much needed healing. This scalp serum is a hair repair treatment that does wonders to smoothen, soften and strengthen your hair, so you can style it in different ways. Besides nourishing your scalp to keep flaky, dry scalp at bay, the combination of the certified organic ingredients in this product – Sea Kelp, Argan Oil and Shea butter, all work beautifully together to create the perfect storm – seals and smoothes hair cuticles. Its damage repair formula helps to restore shine and promotes hair elasticity, while deeply moisturizing hair and scalp.

This is a Scalp Treatment, so apply directly to the scalp at night and massage in gently. Next morning, wash and condition hair as usual, and you’ll notice visibly softer, smoother and shinier hair!
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp -  mineral-rich nutrition seals and smooths hair cuticles.    Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.    Shea Butter -  deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair.
ExtraField8: Apply directly on scalp nightly. Massage in gently. Next morning, wash and condition hair as usual.

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter infused with Frankincense & Myrrh

Description:
Is your body in need of some extra-pampering? What could be better than an extra-moisturizing body butter that deeply hydrates and soothes dry skin? SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter infused with Frankincense & Myrrh provides intense hydration, repairs and rejuvenates dry, dull skin while preventing early signs of aging. Raw Shea butter in its purest form is infused with the skin-soothing and aromatic extracts of Frankincense and Myrrh to create this ultra-moisturizing body butter. Used by generations in the villages of Africa, Shea butter can help protect and revitalize skin and hair. It also contains Vitamin E to help protect skin from free radical damage. Frankincense and Myrrh have anti-inflammatory properties and help to calm and revitalize dull skin while preventing signs of aging.

Thick and moisturizing, SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter infused with Frankincense and Myrrh is an excellent body care product that is easy to use. You only need to rub a small amount over slightly damp skin to deeply moisturize and repair your skin. Enriched with vitamins and essential fatty acids, this nourishing body butter, protects your skin against wrinkles, dry skin, psoriasis, massage, stretch marks, burns, chapped lips and sun damage.
ExtraField7: Raw Shea Butter - Deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids.  Frankincense & Myrrh - Anti-inflammatory properties help calm, heal and revitalize dull-looking skin.  Vitamin E - A powerful antioxidant highly effective in protecting skin from free radical damage.
ExtraField8: Take a small amount in the palm of your hand. Rub hands together to warm up the butter until it is soft. Then apply to your skin.
ExtraField10: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)* Extracts of Frankincense and Myrrh, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Essential Oil Blend

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion

Description:
Revive and rejuvenate dry, dull skin with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion – a deeply hydrating semi-thick body lotion made with all natural and certified organic ingredients.

This brightening body lotion leaves skin feeling soft and youthful looking. Shea Butter deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids, while Frankincense & Myrrh extracts possess anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial and anti-aging properties which aids in healing dry cracked skin. It’s also fortified with Coconut Oil which nourishes and helps firm skin with Vitamins E and K, iron and fatty acids.

SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Body lotion is a complete body care product that quickly absorbs into the skin to provide natural defense against weather elements. Regular usage improves skin texture as well as tone by boosting new skin cell regeneration while also helping your skin retain natural moisture.

SKUInfo.Name: Honey & Black Seed No-Heat Sugar Wax

Description: Our Sugar Wax is an all-natural alternative to hot waxing. It is water soluble (it can be washed off with soap and water) and it contains no mineral oil or petroleum jelly, which can irritate and clog pores. Applied at body temperature, this natural wax alternative does not burn skin. It effectively removes unwanted hair on legs bikini line, arms and underarms.
ExtraField7: Honey - Honey naturally soothes inflammation and fights bacteria – including E. Coli and salmonella.  Black Seed Oil - Rejuvenates and balances skin with anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial properties.  Raw Sugar - helps to remove dead skin cells, dirt, and oil and open pores.
ExtraField8: Apply the sugar wax in the same direction of hair growth, in sections smaller than the strip you're using. The wax should coat the hair; however, be careful, as applying too much will cause difficulty in moving hair and could break it above or below the skin's surface. Take your strip and place it over the sugar wax in the same direction hair growth, leaving some strip at the end that isn't attached to any hair. Rub your hand flat over the strip a couple of times in the direction of hair growth to ensure the wax is firmly attached to the hair. Holding skin taut, remove strip quickly with one pull in the opposite direction of hair growth. Once finished, rinse any excess wax or stickiness  with our soothing Honey & black Seed Soap. To lessen redness and prevent irritation, massage skin with Honey & Black Seed Spray Elixir. To soothe exfoliated area and even skin tone, apply our Coconut & Hibiscus Even Complexion Creme.
ExtraField10: Sugar (Raw, Brown), Deionized Water, Honey, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Vinegar, Alpha Bisabolol, Black Seed Oil, Willow Bark Extract, Allantoin (Comfrey Root extract), Chamomile Extract, Lemon Juice, Citric Acid, Vitamin E, (Proprietary) Essential Oil Blend, Japanese Honeysuckle Extract

SKUInfo.Name: Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair Hair Straightening System

Description: Do you want to switch up your look? Eliminate frizzy unmanageability hair or get super-straight hair without spending hours on frequent blow-outs, and then go back to your vibrant, bouncy curls…naturally! SheaMoisture's SMOOTH & REPAIR HAIR STRAIGHTENNG SYSTEM smoothes the surface of hair  without permanently breaking bonds, so your natural hair texture gradually returns. This system - treatments, shampoo and conditioner - is designed to work  synergistically to gently deliver smoother, straighter hair, while nourishing and protecting scalp and hair. Formulations include certified organic Shea Butter,  which moisturizes and nourishes with fatty acids and vitamins. Four types of naturally derived proteins work to moisturize, condition, strengthen and protect the hair. Antioxidant-rich Tahitian Noni acts as a natural delivery agent for fragrant Monoi and nourishing Essential Oils that help promote healthy scalp and hair. No Lye, Formaldehydes or Formaldehyde donors. Perfect for achieving smooth, healthy, frizz-free hair at home, with salon-quality results. * This system is a natural system with a gentle pH balanced active.  It does not use any harsh chemicals nor does it use formaldehyde so there is no fear of any damage from this system.
ExtraField7: Organic Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.   Tahitian Noni - antioxidant Vitamin C helps maintain hair's health.   Monoi Oil - reparative benefits revive dry, damaged hair.   Keratin - smooths and reduces flyaways while moisturizing hair.   Peptides - antioxidant protection helps promote healthy hair growth.   Botanical Extracts - heat activated enzymes strengthen and protect hair during heat styling.
ExtraField8: 1. SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Pat dry gently with a towel to remove excess moisture. Detangle with a wide tooth comb. 2. TREAT hair, starting at nape of neck. Using 1 inch sections of hair, apply Hair Straightening Treatment to detangled hair, working through from roots to ends. Saturate entire head. Comb treatment into hair. Do not place hair behind ears or clip in any way.  3. Leave on for recommended time (See TIMING GUIDE below), periodically combing straight. Do not cover hair or apply any heat. Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water. 4. SHAMPOO hair as in step 1 to completely remove the treatment. Gently squeeze hair dry removing excess moisture. 5. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 6. Blow dry hair straight with a brush until 90% dry. For a lasting super-straight style flat iron hair in small strips (no bigger than 1/2" wide) 3-5 times.  * For lasting frizz control (NOT super-straight hair), follow steps 1 through 5 only. DO NOT APPLY HEAT.  TIMING GUIDE     Bleached Hair 5-10 minutes  Color Treated 25-30 minutes  Fine Hair 20-30 minutes  Relaxed Hair 25-30 minutes  Normal Hair 25-30 minutes  Thick/Course Hair 35-40 minutes   Notes • Do not apply treatment to dry hair. • Do not apply heat to hair during the straightening treatment. • After using SMOOTH & REPAIR HAIR STRAIGHTENING SYSTEM, wait 2-3 days before you wash and condition hair again.  Weekly 1. NOURISH hair and scalp. Apply Hair & Scalp Weekly Therapy to wet or dry hair working from base through ends. Saturate entire head. Comb treatment into hair.  Leave on for recommended time (20-40minutes). Rinse well. 2. SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Gently pat or squeeze hair dry to remove excess moisture. 3. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 4. Blow dry as usual.  Routine Cleansing and Conditioning 1. SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Gently pat or squeeze hair dry to remove excess moisture. 2. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 3. Blow dry as usual. * Hair can be washed as often as you would like using the Maintenance Shampoo and Conditioner which are specially formulated to help maintain the life of the system, nourish your hair, reduce shedding and support hair growth.  These plant based products are SLS free, SLES free, Sulfate free, PEG and PPG free, MEA. DEA and TEA free, Phthalate and Petroleum free, Paraben free, Formaldehyde free and free of artificial dyes.   Additional Notes • This gentle system contains active protecting and restructuring proteins.  These active proteins have a distinct odor that will dissipate after HEAT is applied to complete the bonding of these proteins to the hair.  • This system is safe to use on color treated hair.  It is Sulfate free and non-stripping. Transitioning into or away from a relaxer with this gentle system is trouble free. • Heat from your blow dryer and flat iron are a critical part of this sytem. The proteins used are heat activated, that is, the heat facilitates the bonding of the   proteins to the hair providing protection, moisturizing and strengthening. The results are a smooth, shiny finish, lasting manageability and hair is healthier from the inside out. • The complete hair straightening system contains No Sulfates, No Parabens, No Phthalates, No Paraffin, No Synthetic Fragrance, No Mineral Oil, No Synthetic Color, NO DEA  • No Animal Testing, No Lye, No Formaldehyde, No Formaldehyde Donors. • Please note, this system contains four different Proteins and is not Gluten free

Rated 3 out of 5 by Ase from Thankful I wanted to try somethin that would help me straighten my hair without the excess heat of professional pressing and without permanent chemical alteration. This product worked for me. It smoothed my flyaways and nixed split ends. I loved my loser curls and more manageable hair.. I wore my hair out maybe two or three weeks then got my hair braided in Senegalese twists and this product helped my hair stay smooth for months (with weekly washing/hydrating). The ladies who braided my hair commented on how beautiful it was and how strong it was. I naturally have very thick, coarse hair. If I had to type myself, I have a mix of 4a/4b hair. When I took the twists out, my hair seemed to be reverting back. I definitely think it takes longer than 4 weeks to get your hair to return to its pre-system look but I have no regrets. I went on to kinkytwists after my Senegalese twists (I was summer into early fall) and my hair became thicker and more healthy from using this product and I attribute that to more control over frizzing, split ends, and having the proteins in my hair. After wearing my natural hair for about 4.5 years with little straightening during those years, I welcome this product and will use it again. Oh, and my hair did eventually revert back. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a change but use caution. Not all products work the same for everyone. If you have concerns about your hair remaining the same as it did pre-system, it may not be the system for you (based on other reviews). As for me, it works. :-) I will only give the system 3 stars because I hate that I cannot but the straightening treatment individually which is costly in the long run.

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Hand Cream

Description:
SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Hand Cream is an assured way to make your partner reach out for your hand again and again. Dry, chapped hands are not only rough to touch, but are also very irritating. This rich, deeply moisturizing hand cream creates a glove-like protective barrier to seal in moisture and soften overall texture. The dense, non-greasy formula offers wonderful hydration for your hands.

Enriched with raw organic Shea Butter, this super-creamy balm penetrates quickly to protect, nourish and moisturize hands. This rich, super nourishing ingredient with anti-aging properties is the building block for softer, radiant skin. Blended with healing Frankincense and Myrrh extracts, the rich texture of this cream leaves hands soft and smooth with no oily traces, and can be applied as often as needed.

This deeply hydrating formula can help relieve and restore dry skin on hands, and can also be effectively used to treat dry cuticles, brittle nails and hang nails. Massage this silky hand care treatment into hands to counter dryness, re-texturize skin and restore circulation.

Rated 5 out of 5 by Trista Gayle from Not just for men I bought this originally for my man to use (how he barely washes his face is beyond me, and the fact he never used to moisturize after shaving is such a pet peeve because he got just bad razor burn and didn't even care) But I have to say, I'm tempted to take it all for myself! The formula is so different to what I'm used to. I'm used to very heavy creams that take a lot of time to dry. This Three Butters face cream is unique because it turns a little almost to a watery consistency when you rub it in. It is truly lightweight--instantly absorbed without the overly heavy after feeling, but still extremely moisturizing! I use this as all-over face moisturizer. I have combination skin with oily t-zone. First I use a different product all over my face. Then with this Three Butters face cream, I go over lightly over my T-Zone (very sparingly) and more heavy-handed over my dry areas like cheeks and under my nose. Over this winter I had an especially dry patch right under my nose that was very flakey and cracking. This helped start the healing process and is the most moisturizing cream I've found so far for my dry areas. I love this little bottle and wish I could find it in more stores in my area! It was discontinued in the places I used to buy it at, probably due to the men around here being neglectful of self-hygiene and not investing in face products.

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Restorative Conditioner

Description:
Say hello to smoother strands, less static and fewer split ends with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Restorative Conditioner. This is a specially formulated lightweight conditioner exclusively designed to counter the challenges of moisture-resistant dry, damaged hair.

This Hair Treatment is perfection in a bottle. Its unique formula is made with raw Shea butter that deeply penetrates while restoring dry scalp and hair. It has Sea Kelp for mineral-rich nutrition that seals and smoothes hair cuticles, while Argan Oil restores shine and helps promote hair elasticity. The result is a deep conditioning hair care treatment that helps restore health and shine to over-processed hair, to ensure your strands are soft, shiny, moisturized and resilient.

This Restorative Hair Care formula is completely sulfate-free, parabens-free, and color-safe. Use it as a leave-in or rinse out conditioner that detangles, moisturizes, repairs and restores lifeless, damaged hair.
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp - mineral-rich nutrition seals and smooths hair cuticles.  Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.  Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
ExtraField8: Work conditioner through hair from root to ends. Leave on for 3 minutes, then rinse. For deeper conditioning, leave on for up to 15 minutes. As a leave-in, work a dime-sized amount through damp hair, then style as desired.
ExtraField10: Deionized Water, Butyrospermum Parkii ( Shea Butter)*, Argan Oil, Coconut Oil*, Behentrimonium Chloride, Essential Oil Blend, Vegetable Glycerin, Emulsifying Wax, Sea Kelp Extract, Panthenol (Vitamin B-5) Avocado Oil, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower (and) Lonicera Japonica ( Japanese Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Reconstructive Finishing Elixir

Description:
The secret to shining, polished curls free of flyaways and bothersome frizz is SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Reconstructive Finishing Elixir! This intensely moisturizing and penetrating all-natural oil treatment repairs and strengthens hair. It helps combat dry, damaged hair by giving you a fighting chance to control frizz while adding brilliant shine to your gorgeous tresses.

This finishing elixir has reconstructive properties – which means that it helps grow and strengthen hair. The extra-moisturizing properties of this elixir come from raw Shea butter that deeply penetrates scalp to promote hair growth and make hair stronger. It is further infused with Argan Oil that helps restore hair health and impart radiant shine, as well as Sea Kelp that aids in moisture-retention.

This is a multi-tasking hair care treatment that not only hydrates hair over a longer period of time, but it also helps unravel tangles and knots for easy comb-through an everyday possibility. It’s a great option for all hair types, especially thick curly hair.
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp - mineral-rich nutrition seals and smoothes hair cuticles.  Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.  Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
ExtraField8: After styling, spray into hands and apply evenly to seal hair cuticle and add shine. Do not use during flat ironing or other heat styling.
ExtraField10: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Argan Oil, Vegetable Squalene, Carrot Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Sebacic Acid, Sea Kelp Extract, Essential Oil Blend, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower (and) Lonicera Japonica (Japanese Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

CategoryList.CategoryName: Raw Shea, Chamomile & Argan Oil Baby
Raw Shea, Chamomile & Argan Oil Baby

Description: Nurture the delicate skin of your baby with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Baby Oil Rub. Enriched with soothing properties of Frankincense and Myrrh and loaded with Vitamin E found in Argan Oil, this gentle baby oil rub not only moisturizes your baby’s skin but also stimulates the nervous system and helps your baby relax and sleep better. SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Baby Oil Rub is fragrant with hints of myrrh and honeysuckle to calm your baby. The baby oil rub is perfect during winters to seal in moisture and protect the delicate skin of your baby from the irritating dryness. Infused with organic certified Shea Butter which is rich in Vitamin A, it deeply moisturizes and nourishes skin with essential fatty acids. Natural ingredients like Argan Oil and extracts of Frankincense and Myrrh infused in this all-natural baby oil rub, ensure that your baby receives the best skin care. The rich but gentle formula of SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Baby Oil Rub is non-greasy and absorbs easily into the skin. A small quantity of baby oil rub is all you need to hydrate and nourish even dry, sensitive skin. The way to healthy, glowing skin begins with this baby step!
ExtraField7: Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids. Chamomile - exhibits anti-inflammatory properties which help soothe red, irritated skin. Argan Oil - high in Vitamin E, keeps skin soft and smooth.

Rated 5 out of 5 by Katie from This product is a gift from the heavens sent to save me from dry winter skin! I picked this up on a whim the other day at Target because it was on sale. I''ve tried other oil moisturizers before and liked those so I figured I''d give this a shot considering how reasonable the price is compared to other brands. I''m currently baby free so I can''t review this for its intended purpose but I can tell you that my skin drank it up so I would hazard to guess that it would be awesome for little ones, too. I imagine with a baby you''d get even more for your money since this bottle would probably last you quite a while. Moms to be and new mothers would probably appreciate it too, seeing as how this would probably do wonders for your skin as far as helping with elasticity and preventing stretch marks. Baby daddies out there, that''s your cue to treat your baby mama; this would make a great gift. A little goes a long way and being that this is an oil rub it''s going to be a bit messy. That said, I noticed that it''s thicker than the other body oils I''ve tried so it was a bit easier to control. I put it on after the shower and it absorbed into my skin fairly quickly. What I was left with was baby soft skin with a hint of sheen; the sheen faded away eventually as the oil absorbed further into my skin but the feeling of soft moisturized skin lasted for a really long time. Other dry skin sufferers out there can agree that it''s great if a product gives you immediate relief but it''s really impressive if you don''t feel like you need to reapply again in an hour or two. The scent is very subtle but pleasant. I barely noticed it myself but my boyfriend seemed to think I smelled pretty darn good, so I suppose that''s an added bonus. I''m so glad I found product, my skin gets so dry in the winter but I think if I use this regularly that won''t be an issue this year. So in conclusion, buy this. Seriously. It''s amazing. I can''t wait to try more products from this company. You probably should, too.

SKUInfo.Name: Yucca & Baobab Thickening & Volumizing Hair Care System

Description:
This collection works to boost thickness and volume, without sacrificing moisture. It strengthens and improves hair's elasticity, while protecting it from daily stress. Limp, lackluster hair is transformed to vibrant, full-bodied styles. The formulations include certified organic shea butter, which moisturizes and nourishes with fatty acids and vitamins. Yucca is used as a natural fixative to thicken hair, while adding volume. Baobab oil, biotin and bamboo extract combine to reinforce, strengthen and improve hair's elasticity.

Thickening shampoo helps increase the density and thickness of hair while preventing breakage.

Thickening growth milk detangles, conditions and strengthens while increasing volume for thicker, full-bodied hair.

Deep-penetrating anti-breakage masque moisturizes, strengthens and fortifies fine, thin hair. Reinforcing action helps prevent breakage.

Volumizing moisture mist helps increase volume for thicker, full-bodied styles.

Contains:

  • Thickening shampoo 4 fl oz
  • Thickening growth milk 4 fl oz
  • Anti-breakage masque 4 oz
  • Volumizing moisture mist 4 fl oz
ExtraField7: Baobab Oil - contains Vitamins A, C, D, E and F to fortify and strengthen hair. Yucca -  thickens hair while adding volume. Biotin -  a powerful B vitamin that strengthens the hair follicle.
ExtraField8:
Thickening Shampoo - Apply to wet hair, gently massage and work into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. Thickening Growth Milk Apply as a no-rinse protective and styling cream to damp, towel-dried hair as needed.

Anti-Breakage Masque- Section clean wet hair. Apply generously. Use a wide tooth comb to distribute evenly from root to ends. Leave in 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For extra conditioning, cover hair with a plastic cap. Apply moderate heat for up to 30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. When using a hair steamer, do not cover hair. Moist heat will to masque's hydration.
Volumizing Moisture Mist - Spray on damp or towel dried hair concentrating on the root. Style as desired.

Thickening Growth Milk - Apply as a no-rinse protective and styling cream to damp, towel-dried hair as needed.

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter & Argan Oil Repair & Transition Kit

Description:
Transitioning Hair comes with its own set of challenges. When you start to grow out your natural texture you will have to re-learn how to care for your new hair which feels drier and more unmanageable. SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter & Argan Oil Repair and Transition Kit is a hair repair miracle that moisturizes, strengthens and re-grows hair, while providing a protective barrier from environmental stressors.

This hair kit contains Deep Treatment, Moisture Retention Shampoo, Restorative Conditioner & Reconstructive Finishing Elixir from SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter range. The damage repair formula moisturizes hair and scalp to deeply nourish dry, damaged hair. The combination of certified organic Shea Butter and natural ingredients like Sea Kelp and Argan oil work beautifully to restore shine and rebuild elasticity to hair. SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter & Argan Oil Repair and Transition Kit repairs and seals hair cuticles to give you naturally smooth, soft and nourished curls.

Give your hair some serious TLC with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter & Argan Oil Repair and Transition Kit --- a complete hair care system that guarantees to become a true workhorse for girls with transitioning hair.
ExtraField7: Sea Kelp - mineral-rich nutrition seals and smoothes hair cuticles.   Argan Oil - restores shine while helping promote hair elasticity.  Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.  Avocado Oil - rich in Vitamins A, D and E, Lecithin and Potassium.  Helps nourish and deeply moisturize.
ExtraField8: Follow the steps below to enhance the beauty of your natural hair: 1. Raw Shea Butter Deep Treatment Masque - For additional nutrients and moisture, Extra Virgin Olive Oil may be added to masque. Section clean, wet hair. Apply generously. Use a wide tooth comb to distribute evenly from root to ends. Leave in for 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For deep penetrating treatment, cover hair with a plastic cap and apply moderate heat for up to 30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. When using a hair steamer do not cover hair, moist heat will add to masque's hydration. 2. Raw Shea Butter Moisture Retention Shampoo  - Apply to wet hair and gently massage into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. 3. Raw Shea Butter Restorative Conditioner - Work conditioner through hair from rot to ends. Leave on for 3 minutes, then rinse. For deeper conditioning, leave on for up to 15 minutes. As a leave-in, work a dime-sized amount through damp hair, then style as desired. 4. Raw Shea Butter Reconstructive Finishing Elixir - After styling, spray into hands and apply evenly to seal hair cuticle and add shine. Do not use during flat ironing or other heat styling.

SKUInfo.Name: Raw Shea Butter Facial Trio

Description:
Nobody likes to have skin which looks tired and old. Rejuvenate your facial skin with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Facial Trio. This nourishing face bundle will leave your skin hydrated, soft and luminescent, while its anti-aging properties reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Facial Trio contains a Face Mask, Facial Scrub, and Face Moisturizer. SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Facial Mask gently clarifies skin while intensely hydrating it and promoting moisture rebalancing. SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Facial Wash & Scrub provides a deep cleansing which unclogs pores and heals and rejuvenates dry skin. SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Anti-Aging Moisturizer is formulated to lift and re-define facial contours while improving skin elasticity. Its gentle yet deep moisturizing formula makes it the perfect choice for aging, sensitive skin. This face treatment trio is made with a unique blend of certified organic Raw Shea Butter combined with natural ingredients like Frankincense and Myrhh extracts to boost skin rejuvenation and add radiance even to dry or aging skin.

Give your skin a brilliant glow with SheaMoisture’s Raw Shea Butter Facial Trio. This Face Bundle will give your skin the boost it needs to look soft, supple and youthfully refreshed day after day!

Rated 5 out of 5 by Nae from Miss I should preface this review my stating that I usually never buy Shea Moisture products. I was so impressed I had to go back before the sale ended and buy another bottle - I never want to run out!

SKUInfo.Name: Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-In Conditioner

Description:
Dream of smooth, soft curls or coils that you can run your fingers through without getting them stuck in messy tangles? SheaMoisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner will make your dreams come true! This leave-in conditioner from SheaMoisture is an ultra-moisturizing hair treatment which forms a protective layer while reducing the appearance of split ends making your curls look healthier and shinier. This leave-in conditioner is a reparative hair care solution enriched with Jamaican Black Castor Oil rich in essential fatty acids which nourish hair scalp and promote hair growth.

Fortified with certified organic Shea Butter and natural ingredients like apple cider vinegar SheaMoisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner provides nourishing hydration to dry, damaged, over-processed hair which supports hair elasticity and prevents hair breakage as you detangle your curls and coils. The peppermint invigorates hair scalp and leaves you with curls which look and feel healthy and refreshed.

SheaMoisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner is also available in an economical Family Size pack so that you never miss an opportunity to flaunt healthy, smooth, tangle free curls and coils!

Organic Shea Butter - Deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
Jamaican Black Castor Oil - Loaded with repartive omegas that promote healthy hair growth.
Peppermint -Stimulates the scalp for an invigorating experience

SKUInfo.Name: Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Shampoo

Description: Get softer, smoother, shinier, gorgeous looking curls and coils with SheaMoisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen Grow & Restore Shampoo. This gentle cleansing, sulfate-free, color safe shampoo was specially created to bring relief to damaged, brittle, over processed and color treated hair. Straightening, perming or any other style treatment which uses heat, drains hair of natural moisture leaving your curls or coils dry, brittle and prone to breakage. This increases hair shedding and reduces volume making your hair look damaged and unhealthy. This hair treatment from SheaMoisture is fortified with Jamaican Black Castor Oil rich in essential fatty acids which nourishes scalp, stimulates hair follicles and encourages hair growth. Fall in love with healthier, tangle free hair! Natural ingredients like Peppermint and Apple Cider Vinegar blended into SheaMoisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen Grow & Restore Shampoo gently remove product build up and balance the pH level of hair and scalp to make your curls soft, shiny and frizz-free. Certified Organic Shea Butter provides nourishing hydrating which adds definition to your coils. Shea Moisture’s Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen Grow & Restore Shampoo is a gentle hair care solution in a bonus size package that you can use every day to create sensationally soft, manageable, frizz-free curls and coils!

This intensive hair care trio consists of a moisture retention shampoo, a restorative conditioner and a deep treatment masque designed to restore natural health to your hair and leave you with beautiful, frizz-free curls.
